title: Relates to requiring local building and planning regulations to accommodate the use of renewable and alternative energy sources
summary: Provides for the corporation to do studies in targeted areas of Buffalo as part of a retail revitalization program; reports to legislature no later than July 1, 2010.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the town law and the village law, in relation to requiring local building and planning regulations to accommodate the use of renewable and alternative energy sources
